00034 Image::Image ( ) : set( "sequenceNumber,rowVec,columnVec,sliceVec,coilChannelMask,DICOM/EchoNumbers" ), clean( false )
00035 {
00036     addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00037     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionNumber" );
00038     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionTime" );
00039 }
00040 
00041 Image::Image ( const Chunk &chunk ) : _internal::NDimensional<4>(), util::PropertyMap(), set( "sequenceNumber,rowVec,columnVec,coilChannelMask,DICOM/EchoNumbers" ), clean( false )
00042 {
00043     addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00044     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionNumber" );
00045     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionTime" );
00046 
00047     if ( ! ( insertChunk( chunk ) && reIndex() && isClean() ) ) {
00048         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to create image from single chunk.";
00049     } else if( !isValid() ) {
00050         LOG_IF( !getMissing().empty(), Debug, warning )
00051                 << "The created image is missing some properties: " << getMissing() << ". It will be invalid.";
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 Image::Image( const isis::data::Image &ref ): _internal::NDimensional<4>(), util::PropertyMap(),
00056     set( "" )/*SortedChunkList has no default constructor - lets just make an empty (and invalid) set*/
00057 {
00058     ( *this ) = ref; // set will be replaced here anyway
00059 }
00060 
00061 Image &Image::operator=( const isis::data::Image &ref )
00062 {
00063     //deep copy bases
00064     static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( *this ) = static_cast<const util::PropertyMap &>( ref );
00065     static_cast<_internal::NDimensional< 4 >&>( *this ) = static_cast<const _internal::NDimensional< 4 >&>( ref );
00066     //deep copy members
00067     chunkVolume = ref.chunkVolume;
00068     clean = ref.clean;
00069     set = ref.set;
00070     //replace all chunks (in set) by cheap copies of them
00071     struct : public _internal::SortedChunkList::chunkPtrOperator {
00072         boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > operator()( const boost::shared_ptr< Chunk >& ptr ) {
00073             return boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > ( new Chunk( *ptr ) );
00074         }
00075     } replace;
00076     set.transform( replace );
00077     lookup = set.getLookup();
00078     return *this;
00079 }

00082 bool Image::checkMakeClean()
00083 {
00084     if ( ! clean ) {
00085         LOG( Debug, info )  << "Image is not clean. Running reIndex ...";
00086 
00087         if( !reIndex() ) {
00088             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Reindexing failed -- undefined behavior ahead ...";
00089         }
00090     }
00091 
00092     return clean;
00093 }
00094 bool Image::isClean()
00095 {
00096     return clean;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void Image::deduplicateProperties()
00100 {
00101     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "The lookup table is empty. Won't do anything.";
00102     const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &first = lookup[0];
00103     //@todo might fail if the image contains a prop that differs to that in the Chunks (which is equal in the chunks)
00104     util::PropertyMap common;
00105     util::PropertyMap::KeyList uniques;
00106     first->toCommonUnique( common, uniques, true );
00107 
00108     for ( size_t i = 1; i < lookup.size(); i++ ) {
00109         lookup[i]->toCommonUnique( common, uniques, false );
00110     }
00111 
00112     LOG( Debug, info ) << uniques.size() << " Chunk-unique properties found in the Image";
00113     LOG_IF( uniques.size(), Debug, verbose_info ) << util::listToString( uniques.begin(), uniques.end(), ", " );
00114     join( common );
00115     LOG_IF( ! common.isEmpty(), Debug, verbose_info ) << "common properties saved into the image " << common;
00116 
00117     //remove common props from the chunks
00118     for ( size_t i = 0; i != lookup.size(); i++ )
00119         lookup[i]->remove( common, false ); //this _won't keep needed properties - so from here on the chunks of the image are invalid
00120 
00121     LOG_IF( ! common.isEmpty(), Debug, verbose_info ) << "common properties removed from " << lookup.size() << " chunks: " << common;
00122 
00123 }
00124 
00125 bool Image::insertChunk ( const Chunk &chunk )
00126 {
00127     if ( chunk.getVolume() == 0 ) {
00128         LOG( Runtime, error )
00129                 << "Cannot insert empty Chunk (Size is " << chunk.getSizeAsString() << ").";
00130         return false;
00131     }
00132 
00133     if ( ! chunk.isValid() ) {
00134         LOG( Runtime, error )
00135                 << "Cannot insert invalid chunk. Missing properties: " << chunk.getMissing();
00136         return false;
00137     }
00138 
00139     if( clean ) {
00140         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Resetting image structure because of new insertion.";
00141         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Inserting into already indexed images is inefficient. You should not do that.";
00142 
00143         // re-gather all properties of the chunks from the image
00144         BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00145             ref->join( *this );
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149 
00150     LOG_IF( chunk.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" )[3] != 0, Debug, warning )
00151             << " inserting chunk with nonzero at the 4th position - you shouldn't use the fourth dim for the time (use acquisitionTime)";
00152 
00153     if( set.insert( chunk ) ) { // if the insertion was successful the image has to be reindexed anyway
00154         clean = false;
00155         lookup.clear();
00156         return true;
00157     } else {
00158         // if the insersion failed but the image was clean - de-duplicate properties again
00159         // the image is still clean - no need reindex
00160         if( clean )
00161             deduplicateProperties();
00162 
00163         return false;
00164     }
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 bool Image::reIndex()
00169 {
00170     if ( set.isEmpty() ) {
00171         LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Reindexing an empty image is useless.";
00172         return false;
00173     }
00174 
00175     if( !set.isRectangular() ) {
00176         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "The image is incomplete. Aborting reindex. (horizontal size is " << set.getHorizontalSize() << ")";
00177         return false;
00178     }
00179 
00180     //redo lookup table
00181     lookup = set.getLookup();
00182     util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> structure_size; //storage for the size of the chunk structure
00183     structure_size.fill( 1 );
00184     //get primary attributes from geometrically first chunk - will be usefull
00185     const Chunk &first = chunkAt( 0 );
00186     const unsigned short chunk_dims = first.getRelevantDims();
00187     chunkVolume = first.getVolume();
00189     // Determine structure of the image by searching for dimensional breaks in the chunklist
00191     //get indexOrigin from the geometrically first chunk
00192     propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ) = first.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" );
00193     //if there are many chunks, they must leave at least on dimension to the image to "sort" them in
00194     const size_t timesteps = set.getHorizontalSize();
00195     const unsigned short sortDims = dims - ( timesteps > 1 ? 1 : 0 ); // dont use the uppermost dim, if the timesteps are already there
00196 
00197     if ( chunk_dims >= Image::dims ) {
00198         if ( lookup.size() > 1 ) {
00199             LOG( Runtime, error )
00200                     << "Cannot handle multiple Chunks, if they have more than "
00201                     << Image::dims - 1 << " dimensions";
00202             return false;
00203         }
00204 
00205         //if there is only one chunk, its ok - the image will consist only of this one,
00206         //and commonGet will allways return <0,set.begin()->getLinearIndex()>
00207         //thus in this case voxel() equals set.begin()->voxel()
00208     } else {// OK there is at least one dimension to sort in the chunks
00209         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computing strides for dimensions " << util::MSubject( chunk_dims + 1 ) << " to " << util::MSubject( sortDims );
00210 
00211         // check the chunks for at least one dimensional break - use that for the size of that dimension
00212         for ( unsigned short i = chunk_dims; i < sortDims; i++ ) { //if there are dimensions left figure out their size
00213             structure_size[i] = getChunkStride( structure_size.product() ) / structure_size.product();
00214             assert( structure_size[i] != 0 );
00215         }
00216     }
00217 
00218     if ( sortDims < dims ) { //if there is a timedim (not all dims was used for geometric sort)
00219         assert( structure_size[sortDims] == 1 );
00220         structure_size[sortDims] = timesteps; // fill the dim above the top geometric dim with the timesteps
00221     }
00222 
00223     assert( structure_size.product() == lookup.size() );
00224     //Clean up the properties
00225     deduplicateProperties();
00226 
00227     // add the chunk-size to the image-size
00228     for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < chunk_dims; i++ )
00229         structure_size[i] = first.getDimSize( i );
00230 
00231     init( structure_size ); // set size of the image
00233     //reconstruct some redundant information, if its missing
00235     const util::PropertyMap::KeyType vectors[] = {"rowVec", "columnVec", "sliceVec"};
00236     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType & ref, vectors ) {
00237         if ( hasProperty( ref ) ) {
00238             util::PropertyValue &prop = propertyValue( ref );
00239             LOG_IF( !prop->is<util::fvector4>(), Debug, error ) << "Using " << prop->getTypeName() << " as " << util::Value<util::fvector4>::staticName();
00240             util::fvector4 &vec = prop->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00241             LOG_IF( vec.len() == 0, Runtime, error )
00242                     << "The existing " << ref << " " << vec << " has the length zero. Thats bad, because I'm going to normalize it.";
00243             vec.norm();
00244         }
00245     }
00246 
00247     //if we have at least two slides (and have slides (with different positions) at all)
00248     if ( chunk_dims == 2 && structure_size[2] > 1 && first.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00249         const util::fvector4 thisV = first.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00250         const Chunk &last = chunkAt( structure_size[2] - 1 );
00251 
00252         if ( last.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00253             const util::fvector4 lastV = last.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00254             //check the slice vector
00255             util::fvector4 distVecNorm = lastV - thisV;
00256             LOG_IF( distVecNorm.len() == 0, Runtime, error )
00257                     << "The distance between the the first and the last chunk is zero. Thats bad, because I'm going to normalize it.";
00258             distVecNorm.norm();
00259 
00260             if ( hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00261                 const util::fvector4 sliceVec = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00262                 LOG_IF( ! distVecNorm.fuzzyEqual( sliceVec ), Runtime, info )
00263                         << "The existing sliceVec " << sliceVec
00264                         << " differs from the distance vector between chunk 0 and " << structure_size[2] - 1
00265                         << " " << distVecNorm;
00266             } else {
00267                 LOG( Debug, info )
00268                         << "used the distance between chunk 0 and " << structure_size[2] - 1
00269                         << " to synthesize the missing sliceVec as " << distVecNorm;
00270                 propertyValue( "sliceVec" ) = distVecNorm;
00271             }
00272         }
00273 
00274         const util::fvector4 &voxeSize = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" );
00275 
00276         const Chunk &next = chunkAt( 1 );
00277 
00278         if ( next.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00279             const util::fvector4 nextV = next.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00280             const float sliceDist = ( nextV - thisV ).len() - voxeSize[2];
00281 
00282             if ( sliceDist > 0 ) {
00283                 const float inf = std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
00284 
00285                 if ( ! hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) { // @todo check this
00286                     setPropertyAs( "voxelGap", util::fvector4( 0, 0, inf, 0 ) );
00287                 }
00288 
00289                 util::fvector4 &voxelGap = propertyValue( "voxelGap" )->castTo<util::fvector4>(); //if there is no voxelGap yet, we create it
00290 
00291                 if ( voxelGap[2] != inf ) {
00292                     if ( ! util::fuzzyEqual( voxelGap[2], sliceDist ) ) {
00293                         LOG_IF( ! util::fuzzyEqual( voxelGap[2], sliceDist ), Runtime, warning )
00294                                 << "The existing slice distance (voxelGap[2]) " << util::MSubject( voxelGap[2] )
00295                                 << " differs from the distance between chunk 0 and 1, which is " << sliceDist;
00296                     }
00297                 } else {
00298                     voxelGap[2] = sliceDist;
00299                     LOG( Debug, info )
00300                             << "used the distance between chunk 0 and 1 to synthesize the missing slice distance (voxelGap[2]) as "
00301                             << sliceDist;
00302                 }
00303             }
00304         }
00305     }
00306 
00307     //if we have row- and column- vector
00308     if ( hasProperty( "rowVec" ) && hasProperty( "columnVec" ) ) {
00309         util::fvector4 &row = propertyValue( "rowVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00310         util::fvector4 &column = propertyValue( "columnVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00311         LOG_IF( row.dot( column ) > 0.01, Runtime, warning ) << "The cosine between the columns and the rows of the image is bigger than 0.01";
00312         const util::fvector4 crossVec = util::fvector4( //we could use their cross-product as sliceVector
00313                                             row[1] * column[2] - row[2] * column[1],
00314                                             row[2] * column[0] - row[0] * column[2],
00315                                             row[0] * column[1] - row[1] * column[0]
00316                                         );
00317 
00318         if ( hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00319             util::fvector4 &sliceVec = propertyValue( "sliceVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>(); //get the slice vector
00320             LOG_IF( ! crossVec.fuzzyEqual( sliceVec ), Runtime, warning )
00321                     << "The existing sliceVec " << sliceVec
00322                     << " differs from the cross product of the row- and column vector " << crossVec;
00323         } else {
00324             // We dont know anything about the slice-direction
00325             // we just guess its along the positive cross-product between row- and column direction
00326             // so at least warn the user if we do that long shot
00327             LOG( Runtime, info )
00328                     << "used the cross product between rowVec and columnVec as sliceVec:"
00329                     << crossVec << ". That might be wrong!";
00330             setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", crossVec );
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     if ( hasProperty( "fov" ) ) {
00335         util::fvector4 &propFoV = propertyValue( "fov" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00336 
00337         const util::fvector4 &calcFoV = getFoV();
00338 
00339         bool ok = true;
00340 
00341         for ( size_t i = 0; i < dims; i++ ) {
00342             if ( propFoV[i] != -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() ) {
00343                 ok &= util::fuzzyEqual( propFoV[i], calcFoV[i] );
00344             } else
00345                 propFoV[i] = calcFoV[i];
00346         }
00347 
00348         LOG_IF( ! ok, Runtime, info )
00349                 << "The calculated field of view differs from the stored " << propFoV << "/" << calcFoV;
00350     }
00351 
00352     LOG_IF( ! isValid(), Runtime, warning ) << "The image is not valid after reindexing. Missing properties: " << getMissing();
00353     return clean = isValid();
00354 }
00355 bool Image::isEmpty()const
00356 {
00357     return set.isEmpty();
00358 }

00360 const boost::shared_ptr< Chunk >& Image::chunkPtrAt( size_t pos )const
00361 {
00362     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "The lookup table is empty. Run reIndex first.";
00363     LOG_IF( pos >= lookup.size(), Debug, error ) << "Index is out of the range of the lookup table (" << pos << ">=" << lookup.size() << ").";
00364     const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ptr = lookup[pos];
00365     LOG_IF( !ptr, Debug, error ) << "There is no chunk at " << pos << ". This usually happens in incomplete images.";
00366     return ptr;
00367 }

00371     Chunk ret( *chunkPtrAt( pos ) );
00372 
00373     if( copy_metadata )ret.join( *this ); // copy all metadata from the image in here
00374 
00375     return ret;

00377 Chunk &Image::chunkAt( size_t pos )

00385     return const_cast<const Image &>( *this ).getChunk( first, second, third, fourth, copy_metadata ); // use the const version

00388 const Chunk Image::getChunk ( size_t first, size_t second, size_t third, size_t fourth, bool copy_metadata ) const
00389 {
00390     const size_t index = commonGet( first, second, third, fourth ).first;
00391     return getChunkAt( index, copy_metadata );

00393 std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > > Image::getChunksAsVector()

00395     checkMakeClean();//lookup is filled by reIndex
00396     return lookup;

00399 std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk > > Image::getChunksAsVector()const
00400 {
00401     LOG_IF( !clean, Debug, error ) << "You shouldn't do this on a non clean image. Run reIndex first.";
00402     return std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk > >( lookup.begin(), lookup.end() );
00403 }

00405 
00406 size_t Image::getChunkStride ( size_t base_stride )
00407 {
00408     LOG_IF( set.isEmpty(), Runtime, error ) << "Trying to get chunk stride in an empty image";
00409     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "Lookup table for chunks is empty. Do reIndex() first!";
00410 
00411     if ( lookup.size() >= 4 * base_stride ) {
00412         /* there can't be any stride with less than 3*base_stride chunks (which would actually be an invalid image)
00413          * _____
00414          * |c c| has no stride/dimensional break
00415          * _____
00416          * |c c|
00417          * |c  | has a dimensional break, but is invalid
00418          * _____
00419          * |c c|
00420          * |c c| is the first reasonable case
00421          */
00422         // get the distance between first and second chunk for comparision
00423         const util::fvector4 firstV = chunkAt( 0 ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00424         const util::fvector4 secondV = chunkAt( base_stride ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00425         const util::fvector4 dist1 = secondV - firstV;
00426 
00427         if( dist1.sqlen() == 0 ) { //if there is no geometric structure anymore - so asume its flat from here on
00428             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Distance between 0 and " << util::MSubject( base_stride )
00429                                << " is zero. Assuming there are no dimensional breaks anymore. Returning " << util::MSubject( base_stride );
00430             return base_stride;
00431         } else for ( size_t i = base_stride; i < lookup.size() - base_stride; i += base_stride ) {  // compare every follwing distance to that
00432                 const util::fvector4 thisV = chunkAt( i ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00433                 const util::fvector4 nextV = chunkAt( i + base_stride ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00434                 const util::fvector4 distFirst = nextV - firstV;
00435                 const util::fvector4 distThis = nextV - thisV;
00436                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00437                         << "Distance between chunk " << util::MSubject( i ) << " and " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00438                         << " is " << distThis.len() << ". Distance between 0 and " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride ) << " is " << distFirst.len();
00439 
00440                 if ( distFirst.sqlen() <= distThis.sqlen() ) { // the next chunk is nearer to the begin than to this => dimensional break => leave
00441                     LOG( Debug, info )
00442                             << "Distance between chunk " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00443                             << " and 0 is not bigger than the distance between " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00444                             << " and " << util::MSubject( i ) << ", assuming dimensional break at " << i + base_stride;
00445                     return i + base_stride;
00446                 }
00447             }
00448     } else  if ( lookup.size() % base_stride ) {
00449         LOG( Runtime, error )
00450                 << "The amount of chunks (" << lookup.size()
00451                 << ") is not divisible by the block size of the dimension below (" << base_stride
00452                 << "). Maybe the image is incomplete.";
00453         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00454                 << "Ignoring "  <<  lookup.size() % base_stride << " chunks.";
00455         return lookup.size() - ( lookup.size() % base_stride );
00456     }
00457 
00458     //we didn't find any break, so we assume its a linear image |c c ... c|
00459     LOG( Debug, info )
00460             << "No dimensional break found, assuming it to be at the end (" << lookup.size() << "/" << set.getHorizontalSize() << ")";
00461     return lookup.size() / set.getHorizontalSize();
00462 }
00463 
00464 std::list<util::PropertyValue> Image::getChunksProperties( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &key, bool unique )const
00465 {
00466     std::list<util::PropertyValue > ret;
00467 
00468     if( clean ) {
00469         BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00470             const util::PropertyValue &prop = ref->propertyValue( key );
00471 
00472             if ( unique && prop.isEmpty() ) //if unique is requested and the property is empty
00473                 continue; //skip it
00474             else if ( unique && !( ret.empty() ||  prop == ret.back() ) )
00475                 //if unique is requested and the property is equal to the one added before
00476                 continue;//skip it
00477             else
00478                 ret.push_back( prop );
00479         }
00480     } else {
00481         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot get chunk-properties from non clean images. Run reIndex first";
00482     }
00483 
00484     return ret;
00485 }
00486 
00487 size_t Image::getBytesPerVoxel() const
00488 {
00489     size_t bytes = chunkPtrAt( 0 )->bytesPerVoxel();
00490     BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00491         LOG_IF( bytes != ref->bytesPerVoxel(), Debug, warning )
00492                 << "Not all voxels have the same byte size (" << bytes << "!=" << ref->bytesPerVoxel() << "). Using the biggest.";
00493 
00494         if( bytes < ref->bytesPerVoxel() ) {
00495             bytes = ref->bytesPerVoxel();
00496         }
00497     }
00498     return bytes;
00499 }
00500 
00501 std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> Image::getMinMax () const
00502 {
00503     std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> ret;
00504 
00505     if( !lookup.empty() ) {
00506         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> >::const_iterator i = lookup.begin();
00507         ret = ( *i )->getMinMax();
00508 
00509         for( ++i; i != lookup.end(); ++i ) {
00510             std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> current = ( *i )->getMinMax();
00511 
00512             if( ret.first->gt( *current.first ) )
00513                 ret.first = current.first;
00514 
00515             if( ret.second->lt( *current.second ) )
00516                 ret.second = current.second;
00517         }
00518     }
00519 
00520     return ret;
00521 }
00522 
00523 std::pair< util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference > Image::getScalingTo( short unsigned int targetID, autoscaleOption scaleopt ) const
00524 {
00525     LOG_IF( !clean, Debug, error ) << "You should run reIndex before running this";
00526     std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> minmax = getMinMax();
00527 
00528     const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk> > chunks = getChunksAsVector();
00529     BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk> &ref, chunks ) { //find a chunk which would be converted
00530         if( targetID != ref->getTypeID() ) {
00531             const scaling_pair scale = ref->getScalingTo( targetID, minmax, scaleopt );
00532             LOG_IF( scale.first.isEmpty() || scale.second.isEmpty(), Debug, error ) << "Returning an invalid scaling. This is bad!";
00533             return scale; // and ask that for the scaling
00534         }
00535     }
00536     return std::make_pair( //ok seems like no conversion is needed - return 1/0
00537                util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 1 ) ),
00538                util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 0 ) )
00539            );
00540 }
00541 
00542 size_t Image::compare( const isis::data::Image &comp ) const
00543 {
00544     size_t ret = 0;
00545     LOG_IF( ! ( clean && comp.clean ), Debug, error )
00546             << "Comparing unindexed images will cause you trouble, run reIndex()!";
00547 
00548     if ( getSizeAsVector() != comp.getSizeAsVector() ) {
00549         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Size of images differs (" << getSizeAsVector() << "/"
00550                                 << comp.getSizeAsVector() << "). Adding difference to the result.";
00551         ret += ( getSizeAsVector() - comp.getSizeAsVector() ).product();
00552     }
00553 
00554     util::ivector4 compVect( util::minVector( chunkPtrAt( 0 )->getSizeAsVector(), comp.chunkPtrAt( 0 )->getSizeAsVector() ) );
00555     util::ivector4 start;
00556     const size_t increment = compVect.product();
00557 
00558     for ( size_t i = 0; i < getVolume(); i += increment ) {
00559         const size_t nexti = i + increment - 1;
00560         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c1pair1( i / chunkVolume, i % chunkVolume );
00561         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c1pair2( nexti / chunkVolume, nexti % chunkVolume );
00562         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c2pair1( i / comp.chunkVolume, i % comp.chunkVolume );
00563         assert( c1pair1.first == c1pair2.first );
00564         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Comparing chunks at " << c1pair1.first << " and "   << c2pair1.first;
00565         const Chunk &c1 = *chunkPtrAt( c1pair1.first );
00566         const Chunk &c2 = *( comp.chunkPtrAt( c2pair1.first ) );
00567         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00568                 << "Start positions are " << c1pair1.second << " and " << c2pair1.second
00569                 << " and the length is " << c1pair2.second - c1pair1.second;
00570         ret += c1.compareRange( c1pair1.second, c1pair2.second, c2, c2pair1.second );
00571     }
00572 
00573     return ret;
00574 }
00575 
00576 Image::orientation Image::getMainOrientation()const
00577 {
00578     LOG_IF( ! isValid() || ! clean, Debug, warning ) << "You should not run this on non clean image. Run reIndex first.";
00579     util::fvector4 row = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" );
00580     util::fvector4 column = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" );
00581     row.norm();
00582     column.norm();
00583     LOG_IF( row.dot( column ) > 0.01, Runtime, warning ) << "The cosine between the columns and the rows of the image is bigger than 0.01";
00584     const util::fvector4 crossVec = util::fvector4(
00585                                         row[1] * column[2] - row[2] * column[1],
00586                                         row[2] * column[0] - row[0] * column[2],
00587                                         row[0] * column[1] - row[1] * column[0]
00588                                     );
00589     const util::fvector4 x( 1, 0 ), y( 0, 1 ), z( 0, 0, 1 );
00590     double a_axial    = std::acos( crossVec.dot( z ) ) / M_PI;
00591     double a_sagittal = std::acos( crossVec.dot( x ) ) / M_PI;
00592     double a_coronal  = std::acos( crossVec.dot( y ) ) / M_PI;
00593     bool a_inverse = false, s_inverse = false, c_inverse = false;
00594     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Angles to vectors are " << a_sagittal << " to x, " << a_coronal << " to y and " << a_axial << " to z";
00595 
00596     if( a_axial > .5 ) {
00597         a_axial = std::abs( a_axial - 1 );
00598         a_inverse = true;
00599     }
00600 
00601     if( a_sagittal > .5 ) {
00602         a_sagittal = std::abs( a_sagittal - 1 );
00603         s_inverse = true;
00604     }
00605 
00606     if( a_coronal > .5 ) {
00607         a_coronal = std::abs( a_coronal - 1 );
00608         c_inverse = true;
00609     }
00610 
00611     if( a_axial <= .25 )
00612         return a_inverse ? reversed_axial : axial;
00613     else if( a_sagittal <= .25 )
00614         return s_inverse ? reversed_sagittal : sagittal;
00615     else if( a_coronal <= .25 )
00616         return c_inverse ? reversed_coronal : coronal;
00617     else
00618         assert( false );
00619 
00620     return axial; //will never be reached
00621 }
00622 
00623 unsigned short Image::getMajorTypeID() const
00624 {
00625     std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> minmax = getMinMax();
00626     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Determining  datatype of image with the value range " << minmax;
00627 
00628     if( minmax.first->getTypeID() == minmax.second->getTypeID() ) { // ok min and max are the same type - trivial case
00629         return minmax.first->getTypeID() << 8; // btw: we do the shift, because min and max are Value - but we want the id's ValuePtr
00630     } else if( minmax.first->fitsInto( minmax.second->getTypeID() ) ) { // if min fits into the type of max, use that
00631         return minmax.second->getTypeID() << 8; //@todo maybe use a global static function here instead of a obscure shit operation
00632     } else if( minmax.second->fitsInto( minmax.first->getTypeID() ) ) { // if max fits into the type of min, use that
00633         return minmax.first->getTypeID() << 8;
00634     } else {
00635         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Sorry I dont know which datatype I should use. (" << minmax.first->getTypeName() << " or " << minmax.second->getTypeName() << ")";
00636         std::stringstream o;
00637         o << "Type selection failed. Range was: " << minmax;
00638         throw( std::logic_error( o.str() ) );
00639         return std::numeric_limits<unsigned char>::max();
00640     }
00641 }
00642 std::string Image::getMajorTypeName() const
00643 {
00644     return util::getTypeMap()[getMajorTypeID()];
00645 }
00646 
00647 bool Image::convertToType( short unsigned int ID )
00648 {
00649     // get value range of the image for the conversion
00650     scaling_pair scale = getScalingTo( ID );
00651 
00652     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computed scaling of the original image data: [" << scale << "]";
00653     bool retVal = true;
00654     //we want all chunks to be of type ID - so tell them
00655     BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00656         retVal &= ref->convertToType( ID, scale );
00657     }
00658     return retVal;
00659 }
00660 
00661 size_t Image::spliceDownTo( dimensions dim ) //rowDim = 0, columnDim, sliceDim, timeDim
00662 {
00663     if( lookup[0]->getRelevantDims() < ( size_t ) dim ) {
00664         LOG( Debug, error ) << "The dimensionality of the chunks of this image is already below " << dim << " cannot splice it.";
00665         return 0;
00666     } else if( lookup[0]->getRelevantDims() == ( size_t ) dim ) {
00667         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Skipping useless splicing, relevantDims is allready " << lookup[0]->getRelevantDims();
00668         return lookup.size();
00669     }
00670 
00671     LOG_IF( lookup[0]->getRelevantDims() == ( size_t ) dim, Debug, info ) << "Running useless splice, the dimensionality of the chunks of this image is already " << dim;
00672     LOG_IF( hasProperty( "acquisitionTime" ) || lookup[0]->hasProperty( "acquisitionTime" ), Debug, warning ) << "Splicing images with acquisitionTime will cause you lots of trouble. You should remove that before.";
00673     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> image_size = getSizeAsVector();
00674 
00675     for( int i = 0; i < dim; i++ )
00676         image_size[i] = 1;
00677 
00678     // get a list of needed properties (everything which is missing in a newly created chunk plus everything which is needed for autosplice)
00679     const std::list<util::PropertyMap::KeyType> splice_needed = util::stringToList<util::PropertyMap::KeyType>( util::PropertyMap::KeyType( "voxelSize,voxelGap,rowVec,columnVec,sliceVec,indexOrigin,acquisitionNumber" ), ',' );
00680     util::PropertyMap::KeyList needed = MemChunk<short>( 1 ).getMissing();
00681     needed.insert( splice_needed.begin(), splice_needed.end() );
00682     struct splicer {
00683         dimensions m_dim;
00684         Image &m_image;
00685         size_t m_amount;
00686         splicer( dimensions dimemsion, size_t amount, Image &image ): m_dim( dimemsion ), m_image( image ), m_amount( amount ) {}
00687         void operator()( const Chunk &ch ) {
00688             const size_t topDim = ch.getRelevantDims() - 1;
00689 
00690             if( topDim >= ( size_t ) m_dim ) { // ok we still have to splice that
00691                 const size_t subSize = m_image.getSizeAsVector()[topDim];
00692                 assert( !( m_amount % subSize ) ); // there must not be any "remaining"
00693                 splicer sub( m_dim, m_amount / subSize, m_image );
00694                 BOOST_FOREACH( const Chunk & ref, ch.autoSplice( m_amount / subSize ) ) {
00695                     sub( ref );
00696                 }
00697             } else { // seems like we're done - insert it into the image
00698                 assert( ch.getRelevantDims() == ( size_t ) m_dim ); // index of the higest dim>1 (ch.getRelevantDims()-1) shall be equal to the dim below the requested splicing (m_dim-1)
00699                 m_image.insertChunk( ch );
00700             }
00701         }
00702     };
00703     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> > buffer = lookup; // store the old lookup table
00704     lookup.clear();
00705     set.clear(); // clear the image, so we can insert the splices
00706     //static_cast<util::PropertyMap::base_type*>(this)->clear(); we can keep the common properties - they will be merged with thier own copies from the chunks on the next reIndex
00707     splicer splice( dim, image_size.product(), *this );
00708     BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, buffer ) {
00709         BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType & need, needed ) { //get back properties needed for the
00710             if( !ref->hasProperty( need ) && this->hasProperty( need ) ) {
00711                 ref->propertyValue( need ) = this->propertyValue( need );
00712             }
00713         }
00714         splice( *ref );
00715     }
00716     reIndex();
00717     return lookup.size();
00718 }
00719 
00720 size_t Image::foreachChunk( Image::ChunkOp &op, bool copyMetaData )
00721 {
00722     size_t err = 0;
00723     checkMakeClean();
00724     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> imgSize = getSizeAsVector();
00725     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> chunkSize = getChunk( 0, 0, 0, 0 ).getSizeAsVector();
00726     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> pos;
00727 
00728     for( pos[timeDim] = 0; pos[timeDim] < imgSize[timeDim]; pos[timeDim] += chunkSize[timeDim] ) {
00729         for( pos[sliceDim] = 0; pos[sliceDim] < imgSize[sliceDim]; pos[sliceDim] += chunkSize[sliceDim] ) {
00730             for( pos[columnDim] = 0; pos[columnDim] < imgSize[columnDim]; pos[columnDim] += chunkSize[columnDim] ) {
00731                 for( pos[rowDim] = 0; pos[rowDim] < imgSize[rowDim]; pos[rowDim] += chunkSize[rowDim] ) {
00732                     Chunk ch = getChunk( pos[rowDim], pos[columnDim], pos[sliceDim], pos[timeDim], copyMetaData );
00733 
00734                     if( op( ch, pos ) == false )
00735                         err++;
00736                 }
00737             }
00738         }
00739     }
00740 
00741     return err;
00742 }
00743 
00744 size_t Image::getNrOfColumms() const
00745 {
00746     return getDimSize( data::rowDim );
00747 }
00748 
00749 size_t Image::getNrOfRows() const
00750 {
00751     return getDimSize( data::columnDim );
00752 }
00753 size_t Image::getNrOfSlices() const
00754 {
00755     return getDimSize( data::sliceDim );
00756 }
00757 size_t Image::getNrOfTimesteps() const
00758 {
00759     return getDimSize( data::timeDim );
00760 }
00761 
00762 util::fvector4 Image::getFoV() const
00763 {
00764     util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00765 
00766     if ( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) {
00767         voxelGap = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap" );
00768 
00769         for ( size_t i = 0; i < dims; i++ )
00770             if ( voxelGap[i] == -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() ) {
00771                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Ignoring unknown voxel gap in direction " << i;
00772                 voxelGap[i] = 0;
00773             }
00774     }
00775 
00776     return _internal::NDimensional<4>::getFoV( getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" ), voxelGap );
00777 }
